ygData.subject: Re: Screen shots?
ygData.msgSnippet: Yep-- what he said. I have 2 programs that work. One is the simple Paint program that usually comes loaded with a Windows computer.  Open the pic with
ygData.messageBody:
Yep-- what he said.

I have 2 programs that work. One is the simple "Paint" program that
usually comes loaded with a Windows computer. Open the pic
with "Paint," hit save as, change the format from .BMP to .JPG on a
little scroll window--- save, and viola!!

Once you make sure-- post there here to test it out!


--- In theeverquesttavern@y..., namoohs <no_reply@y...> wrote:
> > Hmm...Bmp to Jpeg? How do you do that?
>
> It's something that requires a program. =)You would simply open it
> up.. then choose "file" and then "save as". Then change the file
type
> to "jpeg" and then hit save.
>
> shooman out
